sections.content:
Question:
Where can I find FIT/MTBF and Diagnostic coverage values, or even better a reliability report for Renesas RH850 MCUs ?
Answer:
Kindly refer to the Documentation & Downloads Search Page on our website. The reliability report for the part can be downloaded by selecting the correct part number in the filters.
Link: https://www.renesas.com/jp/en/support/document-search?doc_file_all_types%5BProduct+Reliability+Report%5D=Product+Reliability+Report&doc_category_tier_1=none&doc_category_tier_2=none&doc_category_tier_3=none&doc_category_tier_4=none&doc_part_numbers=&keywords=&sort_order=DESC&sort_by=field_document_revision_date 
In case the link fails, follow the procedure below.

Visit our website www.renesas.com
Select at the top drop-down menu "Design Resources" -> "Search" -> "Documentation & Downloads".
Select the "Type Filter (optional)" for "Quality, Reliability, & Packaging" -> "Product Reliability Report".
You may additionally set an additional filter for the part number in the field "Part Number(s) (optional)" (e.g. "2300" for RH850/U2A device)  
  Suitable Products
RL78
